name: Idea Grove
tagline: PR and marketing for B2B tech companies
description:
Idea Grove specializes in building authority for your brand in ways that other agencies don't. We bring together every form of third-party validation, including media coverage, word of mouth, case studies, customer reviews, search authority, paid editorial and influencer endorsement, to propel your company's narrative and establish your market reputation. We integrate our best media relations, content, design, social and search ideas to create a holistic leadership strategy for your brand.
And to ensure your program achieves maximum impact, we apply account-based marketing principles to expose your target customers to your program's output — again and again and again. Idea Grove has refined and streamlined our offering to ensure our services work in tandem for maximum impact.
